text: Apure () is one of the 23 states (estados) of Venezuela. The state capital is San Fernando de Apure. == Municipalities and municipal seats == * Achaguas (Achaguas) * Biruaca (Biruaca) * Muñoz (Bruzual) * Páez (Guasdualito) * Pedro Camejo (San Juan de Payara) * Rómulo Gallegos (Elorza) * San Fernando (San Fernando de Apure) ==Other websites==
title: Apure
